name: Fold

faqs.a: Fold is a Bitcoin rewards app with a prepaid debit card and gift cards that earn sats on everyday spending.
Fold holds balances in your account until you withdraw; rewards can be sent to your own wallet.
Most card features are U.S.‑only; gift cards and rewards access may vary by region.

supported_network: Visa Debit Card, Credit Card, Giftcards

WW.text: Seamless integration of Bitcoin into traditional finance
High fees possible on some services

US.text: 2% unlimited Bitcoin rewards on credit card

description:
Fold aims to make Bitcoin accessible by integrating it into daily financial activities. It offers a Visa prepaid debit card, gift card purchases, and bill payments, all rewarding users with Bitcoin (sats). Users can also buy Bitcoin with low or no fees, depending on their plan, and deposit Bitcoin into their Fold account for insured custody.

What sets Fold apart is how it combines traditional finance functions like bill pay and debit card usage with Bitcoin rewards in one simple interface. Users don't need to juggle multiple apps or wallets. Rewards can be earned on nearly every transaction, from daily spending to mortgage payments, with bonus sats for gift card purchases. Fold also allows external Bitcoin deposits and provides low-fee conversions from paycheck to BTC, making it easy to live on a Bitcoin standard while minimizing taxable events.

Users praise the ease of use, the ability to stack Bitcoin passively, and the clear design of the app. Some power users run most of their household finances through Fold, using the gift card section for groceries and shopping, and setting up recurring buys with leftover balances at the end of each month. The ability to earn rewards even on ACH bill pay is seen as a unique benefit.

Fold's vision is to be the ultimate platform for living on a Bitcoin standard, making it easy to earn, spend, and save Bitcoin while navigating a fiat world, giving users control and flexibility without the complexity of traditional exchanges or wallets.

compat_explainers.why: Fold lets you spend Bitcoin anywhere Visa is accepted—your balance converts to fiat at checkout.
try: Load your Fold account with Bitcoin or Lightning
Use your Fold Visa debit card anywhere
Earn Bitcoin rewards on purchases (varies by plan)
compat_explainers.gotcha: You're not paying Lightning directly to merchants—Fold converts your balance to USD at payment time. This creates taxable events.

compat_explainers.why: Use your Bitcoin balance for everyday spending via the Fold Visa card, or withdraw on-chain.
try: Tap Send and enter a Bitcoin address to withdraw on-chain
Or use your Fold Visa card anywhere—balance converts to fiat
compat_explainers.gotcha: Card payments trigger fiat conversion (taxable event). On-chain withdrawals incur mining fees. Check fee structure before large withdrawals.

compat_explainers.why: Deposit Bitcoin via Lightning to your Fold account for spending or holding.
try: Tap Receive and generate a Lightning invoice
Send from another wallet to your Fold Lightning address
Funds appear in your custodial Fold account
compat_explainers.gotcha: Fold is custodial—they hold your Bitcoin until you withdraw. Consider moving large amounts to self-custody.

compat_explainers.why: Deposit Bitcoin from exchanges or other wallets directly to your Fold account.
try: Tap Receive and get your Bitcoin deposit address
Send from exchange or another wallet
Funds appear after confirmations in your Fold balance
compat_explainers.gotcha: Fold holds your Bitcoin custodially. Withdrawals to your own wallet are possible but incur on-chain fees.
